forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy with a few showers late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
